sentences.sentence: Dress "tartans, worn on special occasions, have light, bright colours."
sentences.translation: 在特殊场合穿着的礼服，有花格图案，色彩明亮鲜艳。

sentences.sentence: Many tartans date only from the nineteenth century, but some of the old patterns still exist.
sentences.translation: 许多花格图案是十九世纪才有的，不过，有些古老的花格图案至今仍保留着。

sentences.sentence: Nor will a site selling genuine Scottish tartans lose American customers because it USES British English.
sentences.translation: 某网站使用英式英语销售纯正苏格兰裙，也不会就因此失去美国顾客。
